page.title: 06LLANDERLO CONT
page.content:
Recreation Indoor games include cards, darts pool tables, outdoor sports include clay pigeon shooting, riding. Joiing Rugby and cricket teams, squash and bowls at the Sports Club in LLanderlo. Gardening.
Communications All homes have telephone. There is no post office in the area, but there are a few postal colecting boxes. All mail is delivered to the homes.
Housing There is planned council group of houses round Water Works. The rest of the homes are owner occupier.
Information Systems Library in Llanderlo
